What is UTN’s stance on diversity and inclusion?

UTN is committed to fostering a culture of respect and belonging through its Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) principles, ensuring all members can thrive. You can read their official statement [here](https://www.utn.de/en/2025/03/10/statement-of-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-on-diversity-equity-and-inclusion-dei/).

Does UTN have any policies against discrimination?

Yes, UTN strongly condemns anti-Semitism, racism, and discrimination, endorsing Bavaria’s resolution for respect at universities. More details are in their [anti-Semitism statement](https://www.utn.de/en/2024/09/30/statement-by-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-utn-against-anti-semitism/).  

### **DEI Initiatives & Support**

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, what’s the DEI action plan at UTN?

UTN has a two-year DEI action plan, including a dedicated DEI Office and participation in the "Shaping Diversity" audit. The full plan is available for [download here](https://www.utn.de/files/2023/08/230713_CONCEPT_GEP_UTN_unsigned_P-CD.pdf).

Who can I contact for DEI-related questions?

You can reach out to Mariam Ahmed or email gender-equality@utn.de. For academic gender equality, contact women-rep-academic@utn.de.
